content.p: The university offers a range of scholarships. Use our search tool to find out what funding opportunities are available to you. Find funding We provide lots of funding advice specifically for international students. You can also contact your country representative for information on funding your course. Some of our academic schools offer funding specifically for current students/graduates who want to continue their studies with us on a masters course. Find out more: The Alternative Guide Online is available to help students from any subject or nationality source funding for masters, PGCE and PhD study in the UK through grants from charities, trusts and foundations. Please enter your email address and we'll send you the login details. Working part-time while studying can help you fund your course. There are lots of ways to find work:
